report_title.description: The title of the market research report or presentation

executive_summary.description: A concise summary of the report's main conclusions and recommendations

finding.description: A specific insight or conclusion from the research

supporting_data.description: Statistics, metrics, or evidence supporting this finding

source_visual.description: Description of any chart, graph, or figure that illustrates this finding

key_findings.description: List of key findings and insights from the research

market_size.description: Total market size or value mentioned

forecast_period.description: Time period for forecasts or projections

trends.description: Major market trends identified in the report

recommendations.description: Strategic recommendations or action items from the report

settings.system_prompt: Extract key findings from this market research report. Pay close attention to charts, graphs, and visual data presentations. Capture metrics, statistics, and insights from both text and visuals.
